snippet.title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre: Atari 2600
snippet.description:
The Texas Chainsaw Massacre for the Atari 2600 is better known for the fact it was largely ignored by most retailers for it's unprecedented levels of in-game violence. You take on the role of Leatherface and must put a stop to tourists trespassing on your property by using, yes you guessed it a chainsaw. 

See our take on the game here http://world-of-games.co.uk/blog/texas-chainsaw-massacre-atari-2600/

Game Details:
System: Atari 2600
Company: Wizard Video
Developer: VSS
Model #: 008
Year of Release: 1983
Media Type: Cartridge
Number of Players: 1
Controller: Atari Joystick
